backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility setup defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and navigation steps for the multi-page resume builder.
frontend/src/features/editor/ActionVerbH: Dropdown UI component listing action verbs and applying a selected verb via callback.
frontend/src/features/editor/actionVerbs: Provides strong action verbs and a function to replace weak phrases or prepend verbs in text.
frontend/src/features/editor/certificati: Helpers for parsing, formatting, and normalizing certification strings from text inputs.
frontend/src/features/editor/RepeatableS: Reusable control rendering repeatable form sections with editing, reordering, and deletion functionality.
frontend/src/features/editor/ResumeEdito: Main resume editor UI component managing form inputs, local state sync, and store updates for all resume sections.
frontend/src/features/editor/skills.ts: Utility functions for parsing, formatting, and normalizing skill lists from commaâ€‘separated input.
frontend/src/features/editor/types.ts: Type definitions for resume data structures including personal info, experience, education, and projects.
Validates resume data and returns simple field-level error messages.
frontend/src/features/export/pdfExport.t: Generates a printable PDF by cloning an element into a new window and invoking the browser's print API.
frontend/src/features/headline/headlineS: Creates headline suggestions using skills, experience, and predefined patterns.
frontend/src/features/headline/HeadlineS: Displays generated headline suggestions and lets users apply them to their resume.
frontend/src/features/keywords/keywordSu: Maps input text to related keywords and provides insertion logic with optional cursor support.
frontend/src/features/keywords/KeywordSu: Shows keyword suggestions with expand/collapse behavior and allows inserting selected keywords.
frontend/src/features/tips/InlineTip.tsx: Collapsible inline tip component displaying contextual advice with toggle controls.
frontend/src/features/tips/tipContent.ts: Defines structured resume-writing tips for each section and exports a corresponding type.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context providing login, logout, and identity state handling via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains no logic; placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark-mode styles, and print rules for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ResumeEditorPage.tsx: Renders the resume editor with a form and live preview panel based on the selected template.
frontend/src/pages/ResumePreviewPage.tsx: Shows a full resume preview and supports PDF download using the chosen template and data.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateGalleryPage.t: Displays categorized resume templates and lets users select one before proceeding to the editor.
frontend/src/state/resumeStore.ts: Defines a Zustand store for managing resume data, template selection, section order, and update helpers with normalization utilities.
frontend/src/templates/BaseResumeTemplat: Renders resume sections based on current store section order, normalizing skills and certifications and outputting structured JSX.
frontend/src/templates/renderers/index.t: Exports a function returning the appropriate resume template renderer, currently defaulting to the base template.
frontend/src/templates/templateCatalog.t: Provides metadata for all resume templates grouped by category, including IDs, names, descriptions, and features.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins used by the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project state, features, and requirements for implementing live resume preview and removing manual submit behavior.
